title: One total air temperature (TAT) probe is installed beside th…
caption_en: One total air temperature (TAT) probe is installed beside the right nose landing gear door. The probe is electrically heated when the R PROBES anti-ice switch is selected on. EN _

title: The TAT probe provides input to ADC 1 and ADC 2. J EN _
caption_en: The TAT probe provides input to ADC 1 and ADC 2. J EN _

title: The ADC converts TAT information to SAT and the information …
caption_en: The ADC converts TAT information to SAT and the information is displayed on EICAS and via the respective IC-600 computers. J EN _
